CustomField.formula: Completeness_Score_Expression__c* CASE(Probability, 0,1, 0.1,1, 0.2,0.33, 0.25,0.2, 0.3,0.2, 0.15 )+ Completeness_Score_Investigation__c* CASE(Probability, 0,0, 0.1,0, 0.2,0.67, 0.25,0.4, 0.3,0.4, 0.3 )+ Completeness_Score_Business_Case__c* CASE(Probability, 0,0, 0.1,0, 0.2,0, 0.25,0.4, 0.3,0.4, 0.3 )+ Completeness_Score_Evaluation__c* CASE(Probability, 0,0, 0.1,0, 0.2,0, 0.25,0, 0.3,0, 0.25 )
CustomField.label: Completeness Score
